post.body: Yeah, your show is freakin' me out. Thanks. Uhhh, yeah. Thanks.
It's the bass and drums that make everyone else look good. It's all about the rhythm section. ;)
Yo. I was there in spirit. Did you have a good time? I saw some photos of kids havin' fun and cool Yule logs. Heh.
Hope you are feeling better. Merry Christmas to you!
Look into this. Your blog/website kicks ass. http://previous.mcmurry.com/award/magnumopus
NSFW! NSFW! LOL.
Thanks!
Gratz!
BTW, Robert Mondavi is a wine. You should try it. Yum. Pinot all the way. OK, nite nite.
WTF am I still doing up? Robert Mondavi *burp* and I are hanging out, watching some ghost show on Travel Channel.
Oh how I love KEXP's Song of The Day. http://is.gd/dBsY
I'm at work. So sad. I wish I had another day to myself.
Yep. Merry Christmas to all my twitter peeps.
Oh Opera browser, how I love you. Where have you been my whole life? OK Opera, it's crunch time. Let's see how you do.
Goodbye Firefox. Hello Opera. Safari, you can't upload my stuff. I'm sorry. I'll keep you, but just waiting in the wings.
Oh Firefox, why do you quit on me?
Safari just doesn't do what I need it to sometimes. Firfox just seems to not work sometimes. Santa, bring me a kick ass browser for Xmas.
THIS is amazing. http://mcmurry.com/index.php
White elephant exchange underway. Lame. So lame. Seriously.
Quote of the day: "You're picky. They're from Boston."
